references: In our proposed solution, we reduce the communication cost of each client update to the PS by quantizing them using subtractive dithering. We choose the step size of the quantization and the dithering parameters based on a gamma random variable. Such a trick achieves a quantization error that follows a Gaussian distribution, and hence, results in
. Our solution uses the following fact about the scale mixture of uniform distributions, which appears in
